name: Woxel
description:
A Voxel Based Real Time Strategy Game!

Still In Development, come back a bit later!

Inspired by Age of Empires and Warcraft 2

Based on the Zoxel Engine

Features (WIP)

  • Campaign
  • Multiplayer
  • Custom Maps

How To Play

  • WASD for camera movement
  • Left Click to Select Units (Work In Progress)
  • Alt F4 to close (wip)
Coming Next
  • Fog of War
  • Starting Building (base)
  • Unit Production
  • Select Units
  • Command Units to Attack or Gather
  • End of Game UI - when killed all enemy units

Buildings

  • Fotress (Base)
  • Barracks
  • Towers
  • Walls

Units

  • Soldiers
  • Heroes
  • Horses
  • Catapaults
  • Golems

Resources

  • Gold Mines
  • Forests
  • Wildlife
  • Farms
